subject: Gambling
Football
lead_paragraph: As the N.F.L. playoff races clamber to the finish line, tens of thousands of fans’ so-called survivor pools will climax in a nail-biting, flat-screen-smashing and cash-counting frenzy.
snippet: As the N.F.L. playoff races clamber to the finish line, tens of thousands of fans’ so-called survivor pools will climax in a nail-biting, flat-screen-smashing and cash-counting frenzy.
